meanings.definition: A toasted or roasted food item, typically referring to a piece of bread or tortilla.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a crunchy tostado with my soup.
meanings.sent2: She spread butter on the tostado before adding avocado.
meanings.sent3: The tostado jumped out of the toaster and landed on the floor!
meanings.sent4: The tostado of the morning sun warmed the earth.
meanings.sent5: The smell of freshly baked tostado filled the kitchen.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that has been toasted or roasted, often used in reference to coffee beans.
meanings.sent1: The tostado was a perfect addition to the coffee shop's menu.
meanings.sent2: The tostado added a rich flavor to the coffee blend.
meanings.sent3: The tostado in the coffee machine started singing a tune!
meanings.sent4: His words were like a tostado, carefully crafted and full of warmth.
meanings.sent5: The tostado aroma filled the room, inviting everyone to take a sip.
